generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wet asphalt surface with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz logo in the foreground, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by curbs and poles, which is characteristic of a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story stone building with large windows and commercial signs is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous tall trees with green foliage line the street, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street, some holding umbrellas.
- car: A red car is parked on the left side of the street, and other cars are visible parked along the street.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at the intersection on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs, including a "No Parking" sign and a "No Entry" sign, are visible along the street.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the image, near the sidewalk.
